title: Places Lived, and called home
name: Places Lived, and called home
description:
A Map by Gfbirch

This is a map of all of the places Ive lived. At the age of 23 I had hit my 74th home. I have never lived anywhere more then 6 months other then the last couple places Ive lived. Nomad thru and thru.

properties.name: 1 Bedroom Party Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch This is where I moved after I got my current job. I lived with a couple of people for a bit but when I decided I wanted to live on my own, this is where I went. I lost a wife, deposit, and many friends here. But many fond memories of "Kings Cup", "The Godfather", and SG events still stain the surroundings.

properties.name: 2ND Of The 80th
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchLawton OKThis is where my squad bay was when I was attached to Fort Sill, OK. This was where I went to school to be an artillereyman.

properties.name: 4th Street 1 Bedroom (9th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchI was never there. I had a lot of friends when I moved to Sparks and I always wanted to stay with them. Mom was away half the time and the apartment was small. This was also the house where my mom reported me as a runaway, when I wasnt.

properties.name: Aunties Sunroom and Bedroom (9th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchAfter a shortcomming on rent we moved in with my aunt. I got a bedroom and my mom got the sunroom (the white box).

properties.name: Birth Home
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: C BRTY 1ST BN 11th MAR
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchWhen I first reported to the FMF this was where my barracks room was. I was a scared new PFC and this is where all the hazing that never happens in the CORPS, NEVER HAPPENED. Oh Rah Charlie Battery!

properties.name: Colombia Sulfer Smellin Home
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Current Home
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchCurrent HomeMy home for 2ish years.

properties.name: Dad's Home
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchLived here off and on. In fact, more OFF then ON.

properties.name: Danes House where I rented a room for a few months.
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where I stayed after a stranger gave me keys to his house and said "Make yourself at home, brother." Dane let me rent a room for about 6 months, until he changed his lifestyle. He went from, "Due Im bringing that one hot chick over tonight so turn your radio up, unless you like to hear that kinda stuff.". To "Sorry the kids came into your room. So it was about time for me to move on. Thanks brother.

properties.name: Digiovanna Crib
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchWhen my mom kicked me out for bringing him over I stayed with him for a while. I needed a place to live and he let me sneek in and stay every now and then, without his mom knowing. Thanks Chuckie!

properties.name: Dixie Hell
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was where I finally ended up after I was imancipated. My girlfreinds parents (Eventually wife #1) let me move in. Unfortunatelly Cassandra wanted to stay in the same room and this is where she claimed to get knocked up by me. On a side note, she tried killing me here, he he.

properties.name: Flagstaff
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchFlagstaff AZWhere I first started my comics adiction.

properties.name: Galena Trailer (9th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Gene's House in Manhaten
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Genes Pad
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where we moved after a shortcomming in 9th grade. This is where I started my movie fetish. Mike and Gene bought damn near every movie that came out, and I got to watch em! This was also the place where the child molester lived next door. And my best friends who lioved there (not really) always wanted me to come over and stay the night!

properties.name: Grandma's Oak Tree Home
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Grove Street Apartment (7th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was where we moved when we first moved to Reno. We came here on vacation and I picked some numbers at breakfast and my mom won 40 bucks. A few weeks later we moved right down the street, and the famous gambling began. We later moved to South Reno after a kid pulled a gun on me at school on my first day.

properties.name: HQ 1ST BN 11th MAR
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was where I moved after I caught Cassandr (wife #1) with everyone. I stayed in two room right next to each other. One when I was a Lance Corporal, and the other when I got promoted to Corporal. This is also where I stayed when I was dating Maranda (wife #2). And she was active duty navy, so she hated sleeping on ship. So everynight she would drive and hours up from San Diego and sleep in my twin bed with me. It was fun hiding her when inspections hit. But when you are the one giving most of them, IT DOESNT MATTER!

properties.name: Howards
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was a strange hotel / studio place we lived that literally had one room with a sink. We lived here for a while to save money and eventually moved down the street.

properties.name: India Company MCT
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was my squad bay when I was stationed in MCT.

properties.name: Our OFF base home.
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where Maranda (wife #2) and I moved after the base houses in Point Loma were sited for demolition. We thought moving away from the city would help. The only thing it did was draw us apart more. The stink of this place after I came back and got my stuff from up north will remain in my head for the rest of my life.

properties.name: PMS Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was our second home in Reno after we had to hastely move from the previous school. I transfered to Pine Middle School which was across the street and this was where the gambling hit hardest. This is where I think I lost the most and where we gained the most due to ma gambling. Its also where I saw the OJ chase.

properties.name: Pine Meadows Townhouse (12th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchWhere I became Imancipated after my mom and boyfriend kicked me out.

properties.name: Platoon 2108, Echo Company MCRD
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was where I was made a man. This was my second home at MCRD San Diego in boot camp. After being dropped to Echo Company, this is where I lived for three months and learned the fundamentals of the Corps.

properties.name: Platoon 2197 Fox Company MCRD
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was where I had started my journey to becomming a man. Unfortunately I was a liar and after a month of living in this squad bay I was dropped for integrety violation and sent across the way.

properties.name: RV (10th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Ranch house in Wamego
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Re's Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchLived here for a short short time. Started playing clarinet here.

properties.name: Re's Maple Home
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Salk Lake Home/Hotel
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchWhen I went to school for my current job, this is where I stayed for a total of 8 weeks.

properties.name: Serra Mesa Troop Housing (Also Josh Gracins hood!)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is the apartment Cassandra (wife #1), Geoffrey, and I moved when we got out of the off base kick. It wasnt a bad place, just everyone knew you were there. It was the troop housing so all of the horney Marines and their wives were always on the prowl. I caught Cassandra sleeping with my best friend not to mention half of 3rd BN 1st Marines. This is where I left her, and this is where she left me..... with thousands of dollars of damage. Oh yeah did I mention Josh Gracin lived in Serra Mesa too? What a DORK, but I gotta admit, Im a fan.

properties.name: Stuart Mesa Dream Home
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where Maranda (wife #2) and I moved after I became a single parent. When I recieved custody of Geoffrey we got bumped to the top of the list. This is where I found out the results of the paternity test, and this is where Maranda and I lived after getting married. It was the coolest home in the best neighborhood. I have very fond memories there and will never forget the strange shape of the living room .

properties.name: Studio Start
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where Cassandra (wife #1), Geoffrey and I moved after I joined the Corps and couple afford to move her down. It was a cozy studio with the perfect affordable price. I found it, reserved it, and paid for it all over the phone prior to seeing it just to rescue my 1st wife from the place she was living back home. And surprisingly it was perfect. Perfectly small that is.

properties.name: The Perfect Skippin School House (11th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch This was a great apartment! It was literally right across the street from my high school. Perfect for skippin, or just hangin out at lunch. Centrally located, this was also where I shot my thumb with an arrow an ran to the school nurse after hours to get it removed.

properties.name: The Phat , Fat, new life house.
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where Maranda (wife #2), Geoffrey, and I moved to after I got out of the Marines. Although I had found out Geoffrey wasnt paternally mine, I thought I would try to get it it work. But I couldnt. I had gained a lot of weight and Maranda and I lost a child she was carrying. My mom moved in for a VERY SHORT time and this was probablly one of my favorite places to live. Other then the bad events it was perfect, I mean you cant hate a place that is across the street from MCRD or Marine Corps Recruit Depot San Diego, the place where I was truely born.

properties.name: Two Bedroom Apartment with 1st Wife
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis is where Cassandra (wife #1), Geoffrey and I moved after we settled our budget. We previously lived in the same complex but needed more space. This two bedroom was home to many fights and though away from Base, it wasnt far enough for her, and it was too far for me.

properties.name: Vegas Trailer
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch

properties.name: Victorian Inn (10th Grade)
properties.description: Posted by Gfbirch This is where my grandma moved me after my mom left to get some R & R. We stayed in this hotel for 5ish months and I kept going to school. This is where I met my first girlfriend and this is where my mom found some 30 year old Freakie Tweekie guy who was abusive.

properties.name: Washington Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchExperienced many a storms here.

properties.name: What Youll Do For A Job.
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchThis was my first home once I moved to the Inland Empire. When I first got my job I was married and couldnt afford rent for her and a place to live, so I lived here. Yes thats a tree, and I slept in my car day and night for two months straight before a stranger gave me keys to his house in Yuciapa and let me rent a room cheap.

properties.name: Wolvertons House (10th grade summer)
properties.description: Posted by GfbirchAfter living in the RV this is where my mom and I moved after she got married to a co worker. She married this HUGE guy and we moved in here. Except they were one bedroom short so I decided to park the RV in the driveway and sleep there.
